name: Treasure Island (itch) (Huflute)
description:
Made with Unreal 5

You play as an adventurer who lands on a deserted island, hoping to find a treasure. Instead, he finds a enraged spirit threatening to unleash a volcano on him. You have five minutes to escape.

Controls explained in game.

A no timer mode is available so you can roam the game freely. I've hidden some easter eggs and jokes !

Base project, base blueprint, 3D art by Remi Cham.

Scenario, dialogues, gameplay programming, game design, sound design, sound integration, audio programming, voice design and UI design and programming by Hugo Angel (Huflute).

Voice design using soundly's voice designer.

With audio review by Dorian Pfister.

Made as a personnal project during my training at AudioWorkshop.
